website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality concerns, it's packed with features and falls on the lower end of the price scale.
pros: An affordable light that's very easy to use
Features natural light option or choice of 7 colors plus brightness control
cons: Has FM radio, but it doesn't always get the best reception
Some plastic components don't feel particularly durable

customer_reviews.title: Basically just as good as the $100+ models.
customer_reviews.text: There is no significant difference in quality between this model and the more expensive $100 dollar model that phillips makes. It's been working fine for me, helping me to wake up earlier, and I use it in conjunction with my phone alarm. The light turns on 30 minutes before the alarm itself goes off, and the light becomes successively brighter. I don't usually wake up from the light, but having the light in my face when I first open my eyes has worked wonders in helping me get out of bed. Save your money, and buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Corey Munn

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: It sounds dumb, but this alarm clock changed my life. I was tired of waking up in a dark room to a loud annoying alarm. This alarm clock is soothing. I wake up to a nice, pleasant tone (which is plenty loud. If anyone knows how to turn down the volume hit me up). I find myself humming that tone throughout the day. And the light feature is fantastic. It makes for a great bedside lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to operate quickly
customer_reviews.text: This clock has a hard learning curve. Works well, just not as simple as I thought it would be. You can't choose the radio stations manually it has to scan for them and it auto sets all the stations that have strongest signal. The volume only goes 1 direction so if you want to make it quieter you have to click the button all the way up to level 15 and then it starts back over at zero. So it has to get very loud before it gets quiet again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheychey0611

customer_reviews.title: Waking up to the light is life changing
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. Waking up to the light is one of the best things ever. It usually wakes me up about 5-10 min before the alarm goes off due to the gradual increase in the light. If you hit the snooze the light stays on so it’s really hard to actually snooze but that’s a good thing. I have mine set to music and that starts out low and also gradually increases like the light. The only thing I don’t like is seeming the time/alarm. Buttons are hard to use. This clock has been a life changer. No more being shocked awake. I wake up feeling refreshed and happy. Love this alarm clock. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jodirome

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint with this would be the one thing it's supposed to be good at, waking your body up gradually. To do this, I expected it to gradually start at 1% brightness and build to full brightness at wake up time. Unfortunately this does not happen. 30 minutes prior to wake up it jumps straight to a very bright level, maybe 60% and then slowly builds from 60-100 over the next half hour. This is a problem because it wakes me up every time since 60% is still really bright! My other complain would be the user interface is very old and inefficient. It certainly is manageable, but if you're not technically included you might be frustrated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dyeace

customer_reviews.title: Can i return this?
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst alarm lol sorry just being honest just feels like it’s a waste , i can’t pick certain radios stations sometimes the alarm doesn’t go off and if you snooze it good luck waking up again because it won’t turn back on ... i read all instructions and googled all i can to try to fix these things i just really wish i could return it
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what is stated.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. It looks pretty and shows the time, but there's no way to turn the volume down without going a lot louder, and it won't find any radio stations except the very first one when you turn it on. The reviews for this product are false-- as they are for some weird magnetic knife holder so when it shows lots of positive reviews, that is actually a lie. This is the first purchase I've been extremely disappointed on and I'm going to return it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Problem is that if you're trying to see what time it is in the dark, the numbers are so bright that they cannot be seen. Wake up acclimated to the darkness, and the numbers are a too-bright orange blur that actually create too much light in the room. Clock has to be faced away from the bed. Also when it's lit up, you cannot find the buttons because you cannot see the face. Again, it's too bright. And the buttons are not raised at all, and you can't find them by feel. It makes an interesting night light, but it's unusable as an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money if you need a WORKING CLOCK!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and the recipient has tried and tried to get it to work, reading online about how to fix it and NOTHING works. When they finally figured out how to set it because there were no instructions in the box, the time never changed. The lights worked and radio worked but the MOST IMPORTANT PART of a clock is telling time, however the time never changed from what it was set at. Disappointing because it was a present and now, since it was a gift, it is too late to return, so just out the money and the money to purchase a new, better gift.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail S. Ferstein

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE, Bright, intuitive functions
customer_reviews.text: 1. First of all, this works. You wake up differently because of the light. I wake up before the alarm sounds even if I’m mid-REM (my dreams get the cue from the light to “wrap up” quickly). 2. I set the whole thing up without reading the manual. 3. I like the color shift and individual color modes. Not really the primacy purpose but a fun feature.
customer_reviews.author: N. T

customer_reviews.title: Works for our child
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 4y.o. hoping for an easier morning routine. The “nature sounds” are on a short loop. We picked the bird chirping sound and it replays the same three chirps until you get annoyed with it and turn it off. We have it set to wake her up at 5 so it starts the chirping at 430 and works well. She wakes up fairly pleasant. Has only been a week, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ypu would never believe how difficult to break this thing is. I have ferrets that very much enjoy pulling on the cord to knock it off my nightstand, and yet the worst that happens is the face pieces popping off. The design makes that very easy to fix. My only complaint is that I can't set my own radio stations, as it auto loads what it scans (so if your favorite is on a high wavelength, it may fill up before it gets there) but otherwise this is a very durable and worthwhile clock!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really good way to wake up in the morning. The lighting makes for a smoother transition into wakefulness than a traditional harsh alarm
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Wang

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but be gentle. This is a dainty lamp. Has shot power cord (which leaves mine at fall potential from my tall dresser where it sits). Don’t use sound so can’t speak to that. Just use the natural light option. For the price, however, it is a great value. We have an industrial loft so no windows in bedrooms. This was a great purchase to de of these lamps are helpful to wake up in am with the absence of natural sunlight. It was a win. Before making a move on an expensive option, this is a great step. Have had for about 6 months now with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Keepitreal

customer_reviews.title: God send on early mornings
customer_reviews.text: My old job required me to be at the hospital by 4 am on some mornings. This was a life saver. I am absolutely NOT a morning person and I was legit suffering on the days I have to wake up before the sun came out. I would highly recommend this to anyone who has a hard time rolling out of bed. The bright light woke me up 15 minutes before the alarm would even go off, so I had some time to adjust to the light brightening in my room (Gets SUPER bright) before getting out, so I woke up a bit and started my day.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita K

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says but it has a good number of faults. The sound quality is subpar, the LED display is too bright at both settings (you can turn it off though), and the micro USB power is very finicky. The light itself is very bright and does its job well, but I would honestly consider a timed dimmer plug on a lamp as an alternative that lets you keep your existing clock (or lack of clock) while getting the sunrise simulation.
customer_reviews.author: Juliett Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but could be worse
customer_reviews.text: Controls are a little janky. Buttons dont show up well in the dark but you get used to where they are. You can't turn the volume down, you have to keep turning it up until it goes back to level 1 so gets annoying for roommates at 5 in the morning. I like that it will scan for all of the stations in the area so you dont have to preset them, though you do have to scroll through all of them to get to the one you want. The light feature has really helped me in these fall months when I wake up before sunrise and need the light to motivate me out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life, I awake before the sound of the alarm even when it is dark and dreary outside. The radio has decent sound, much better than I expected. I have bumped it a few times during the day. Because it is lightweight, it has fallen off my nightstand. However, it still work like a charm. While I wish the material had a bit more heft, it is durable. Maybe the lightweight feature will make it good for travel. I have found it easy to set up as well. I don't think I will ever have another alarm that doesn't have the sunrise feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: It does work for gradual lighting for waking up
customer_reviews.text: I have to refer to my instructions every time I want to change the time or something. It is not easy to set up. I try to set up and use the different colors but it always goes back to white light, could be a step I am missing. It does serve its purpose, to wake me up with the warm lighting. The clock light is too bright, even on the low setting. So we are not using it right now, I use this mainly in the winter when it is dark outside in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going to Goodwill
customer_reviews.text: I've had the thing unopened in the box for months, due to remodeling. Tried to set it today. Cute design, but horrible, cheap . Could not get past trying to get it to A/M. Tried to set radio, it scanned, one station comes up with mostly static, in any room I tried it in. Waste of money....sorry Amazon carries such junk, they should screen their vendors better. Even though I'm a Prime member and didn't have to pay shipping, I'm not paying to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations for this clock than I should have, but even with that said I like it. The light is not as sunshiney-soft as I had hoped but I absolutely love waking up to a light that progressively gets brighter. The ocean sounds isn’t the best or clearest compared to other noise machines I’ve had, but am still using it as my wake up sound. It’s easy to set up for the most part. Overall really happy with it and will be buying another one for the kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Missb

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The clock works - it gradually lit and woke me up just as sunlight would. The problem with the clock is that the controls are not raised - you cannot feel where the buttons are, so if you try to snooze or re-set, you have to be able to see where the buttons are - and so then you have turn on a light, defeating the purpose of a clock that will gradually, gently wake you up. And if you need glasses, it compound the problem. I am no longer using it as an alarm clock as I could not work the controls in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for an alram clock that lasts 3 days passed the return period? This one's for you!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm broke within a month of purchasing it. It was not dropped are tampered with in anyway and all of a sudden it just stopped working. Whenever I try to set an alarm, the FM radio starts playing and resets my set alarm. On top of that, none of the alarm music work anymore. Whenever I press the "music note" button on the top of the alarm, the beginning of the song plays and dies out within 1 second. The cherry on top is that my return period passed 3 days before it broke. Unless the seller reads this, there is no way I'm getting a refund or return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually doesn't tell time...
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, this clock doesn't tell time properly. Not buy an hour or a minute...very strange. Set it for 2:00 and came back a couple of hours later and it was off by 36 minutes? Never seen such a thing with a digital clock. Just got back from vacation and noticed the return window closed on Aug 4. Guess I can use it for a light. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I like the light
customer_reviews.text: I like the light, but it doesn't wake me up. And I have to agree with others that the sounds are fake and awful. I couldn't use any of them. I'm really just using it for a clock, but my kitten knocks it over all the time because it's not that stable. I figured I could use it for soft light if I need it. Just don't expect the sounds to be high quality. The light is nice, but it takes more than that to wake me up.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. The sounds are more like what you'd expect from windows 1995 era video game. Lights work well. I would say worth it for the price considering the low quality speaker. There seems to be quite a price gap, clocks like this are either $20 or $80, so I went with the $20 clock. I'm happy with it. Had I bought the $80 clock and got this result I'd be angry.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Light turning on hours before alarm
customer_reviews.text: Feels very cheap, like a toy. The built in sounds for the alarm (nature sounds, etc) also sounds like a toy. The biggest issue though, is that the light is turning on in the middle of the night. Hours before the alarm time. Also, I set the numbers on the clock to not display, as the numbers are too bright), but the numbers turned on again. I’m very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper2018

customer_reviews.title: Just like it says and looks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and deserves 5 stars for being a reasonably priced morning light alarm clock. It was shipped fast and safe. The only thing that was not 100% was the radio sound quality, however, I don't need it for that so I gave it 5 stars. If you want a radio to play this may not be your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Tunney Ho

customer_reviews.title: Broke the day after return was allowed
customer_reviews.text: This never quite worked right. Maybe it was a "dud," or just save your money. It would turn on by itself, not when the alarm was set, usually in the middle of the night and freak me out! The day after Amazon return for refund was available, it stopped working completely; as if the wires internally are shorted. Really frustrated, bc it wasn't exactly inexpensive!:(
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Really does help me wake up because it eases me awake and forces me to almost literally stare into the sun if I want to hit the snooze button or turn off the light, which seems like a pain, but it's actually very effective because by the time I get to it, my eyes have adjusted to the light and I can't go back to sleep. It has really helped me get to work on time and get my morning off to the right start.
customer_reviews.author: jj15458

customer_reviews.title: Awful volume control is fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: The volume control on this clock is awful. If you want to use the radio feature at all, don't waste your money on this clock. The volume is adjustable in only one direction. So, if the volume is at level 2 and you want to turn it down to level one, you have to click the button up through each higher sound level before you reach the highest level and then it returns to 1. So, if you find the volume too loud, you are forced to make it louder before you can turn it down.
customer_reviews.author: flying solo

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product from reading the reviews but I'm so glad I just took the plunge and bought it! I've been using it for about 2 weeks now and everything is going great. The alarm is super easy to set up and it gets superrr bright! It lights up about 30 mins before your set time and gradually gets brighter and brighter like natural sunlight. You also get to choose from 6 different nature sounds (ex: birds chirping, waves, etc) or the radio to play at the time you set your alarm. This has made waking up at 4am a lot easier for me than the usual loud alarm on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: If you need an alarm clock that has 1. the sound ability to wake up the entire block and/or 2. the option to illuminate every square inch of your house while just chilling in the corner, get this little guy. I couldn't love this clock enough. I have a hard time not waking up to sun light, so this helps in the winter. Plus, the color changing ambiance lighting is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock for different alarm
customer_reviews.text: This clock is really nice if you need a backup or want something different than your phone to wake you up. Decently simple to set up, but I needed the instructions to get all the settings in place. Overall the nature sounds are alright, not anything terribly calming but it is an alarm clock. The gradual light didn’t always work with me to feel more awake when it goes off, but not to say it won’t work on lighter sleepers!
customer_reviews.author: thau25

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good clock so far! I have had it for about a month. I have an easier time getting up now. The buttons were a challenge to figure out at first. You definitely need to read the instructions. The sounds are ok. The light is great! That is why I purchased it. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Good clock but hard to remember how to use its features
customer_reviews.text: This is a good radio and I like the features with the light and music etc but it's so hard to remember how to do what! Seriously, I used the manual to familiarize myself with all the features and about 6 months later when I had to adjust this clock I couldn't figure anything about.
customer_reviews.author: Beriah Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Mornings are peaceful now
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. It’s cheaper than any competitors and it’s functionality and options make it the perfect alarm for me. It took me a few days to get used to just the light feature, but now that I am not jarred awake by noise I have a much more relaxing and productive morning. Programming it is easy and personalizing your desired wake up just takes a few minutes with the user manual.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: This clock is seriously amazing. I love how it wakes me up in ...
customer_reviews.text: This clock is seriously amazing. I love how it wakes me up in the mornings, and it has a backup auditory alarm if you don't wake up to the light. It's made a huge difference in how I wake up in the mornings. It's pretty cheap components, and did fall apart when it fell off my nightstand, but it popped right back together. Along with that, it is a tad wobbly, but as long as it's on a flat surface, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wakes me up gently
customer_reviews.text: Without a reason and only relying on self-discipline it is hard for me to stay up when waking up early. But I found a way. Too many people want to complain instead of learning how it works. It is different and may take 30 minutes to learn but nothing is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W.

customer_reviews.title: Mosche sunrise alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Wakes me with the light usually before the audio goes off, like the colored lights, wish the colored lights could be on a timer instead of having to have a set time to use the sunset alarm. four stars bc I have to refer back to the directions in order to do anything on the clock, little confusing, but other than that I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be able to see the time if Radio/music is playing!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because in order for you to see the time, you have to stop playing the radio. So inconvenient to not be able to see what time is it while music is playing and if you want to know the time, you have to go and switch it back and fort!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but this thing actually works! ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this thing actually works!!! I have to face the clock directly toward my pillow so when I hear the alarm and reach for the snooze button, I am greeted with the glowing sunshine. If the clock is facing any other direction, then I will not see the glow, and will not wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Bulb burned out in 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bulb burned out after 6 weeks, no replacement bulb available. Not impressed. Update: Contacted seller, and the seller offered to replace the clock. Will update the stars and review when I receive the new clock.
customer_reviews.author: jemar

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and even better alarm. I'm very impressed with it. The light starts off low, then gradually brightens until you have no choice but open your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, stopped working for no reason after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: The touch-screen type buttons were always a little annoying, but after a month or so of use, they stopped working entirely, so I can't set the time, set the alarm, or use the light. The clock keeps time, but you can't adjust it. It was also poorly designed in that hitting any button worked to end the alarm, but you had to press a specific and kind of hard-to-find button to snooze it. Sound quality isn't great, but that didn't bother me since I was looking for the light feature. I did love the light feature, so I would recommend getting a light alarm, just not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in good and bad ways.
customer_reviews.text: In general, this product works, though the controls are hard to use and clumsy (e.g., you must press a button several times to turn off the light). However, it's very fragile. Out of the three I ordered, two have broken, one of them immediately and the other after a few months). It's cheap in a good way and cheap in a bad way, in that the cost is low compared to the Philips but also prone to breakage.
customer_reviews.author: W. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because of a Buzzfeed article and I have issues with waking up, I just really resist waking up when I need to. I figured this would be a great product for me. It's fine. It does what it says, kinda. It starts on low light and then jumps to medium and then high light. It doesn't do it "gradually" as promised. My wife finds it more useful than I do so I gave it to her. I wasn't in love. It's not bad, it's just that I had overhyped it in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Krasney

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you don't need to use the radio
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice alarm clock. It makes my room look nice with its style and lighting. It does everything, the only reason why it's not 5 stars because the radio acts weird. It won't let me go to a certain channel on the radio and it was very confusing, but I don't use the radio, so it's fine. The light is bright and the different colors are so cute. Very simple to use (except for the radio).
customer_reviews.author: Litty

customer_reviews.title: Decently easy to use if you don't want the sounds
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well as a basic, set up the time, auto-turn-on light. It doesn't have great sound for the alarm setting, but I keep it off and use my phone so it works well for me. BE AWARE: A lot of the reviews for this are for some other product!!! Be aware that it's a really basic cheap lamp - if you're looking for that it's perfect, otherwise get something nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Sirius B.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable lighting
customer_reviews.text: This product is very lightweight and sophisticated, and lighting is very soft. I bought it because I have to get up and take care of my baby during nights and to be on time wake up my older son to school in the morning. It is very suitable for night light, and very simple to use. I will recommend friends to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and outdated
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes the most annoying noises I have ever heard. I get that it is an alarm clock, but the sound machine components must have been developed in the 1960's. Couldn't even make it a day, had to return
customer_reviews.author: Karley Quartararo

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect alarm clock for my first grader
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect alarm clock for my first grader. Even though he just started to learn how to read analog clock, this product helps him get up in the morning and remind him to do his daily routine. I love it how I can have both options of battery operation or wall charged operation. When it's battery operation, the light is automatically off until I press the button to check for time. The alarm radio can set up to 15 radio stations or I can set up for classical music. I totally recommend this clock if you have little ones who just begin to learn time management and daily schedule. It's an awesome buy for such as great price.
customer_reviews.author: Minfu

customer_reviews.title: love this light
customer_reviews.text: love this light! I only wish there was more a dim over time when using the night light and alarm. The light always seems bright until the timer is done then is dark. Also, some of the "nature" sounds can be quite annoying and some have music to them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit or miss.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 in July and one stopped working now. In September. Disappointed. The one that does work I am happy with but I can’t exchange or return as the window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ejmaing

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY ALARM CLOCK YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only alarm capable of waking me up. SERIOUSLY. Any other alarm, I cannot hear it and I sleep right through it. With this light alarm, I wake up refreshed and ready to take on the day. Seriously. NO OTHER ALARM CLOCK HAS BEEN CAPABLE OF DOING THIS. Amazing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate

customer_reviews.title: Light wakes me up!
customer_reviews.text: After moving into a basement apartment with one remote window, I was having a hard time waking up in pure darkness with just an alarm. This light has helped me wake up even before my alarm sounds. I would use the sounds with this light, but even on the lowest setting it is a little too loud for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Jennie

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love how bright this is, I use it everyday. I like how I don't have to reset the alarm every night and it stays on the same time. The only problem is the alarm sounds. I grew to hate every one of them so I just use the radio now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this alarm clock in August 2018 and it no longer works in November 2018. It was great while it lasted! However our power went out in a neighborhood surge and it somehow broke the clock. The front buttons no longer work, so we can't set the time, alarm, use the radio function, or the sunrise function. Making this completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited yesterday when I received my new sunrise alarm clock! If it works it'll be a huge help to me in my new, darker apartment. However, I'm not sure if the alarm function actually works. All the lights and sounds work fine. In the video, I actually turned on the light just to check. But you can see that the alarm was set for 6:00 and it's now 6:30. I would love to find a way to make the alarm work, or else I'll just be sending it back :/ Update: It does work! User error caused it to not work the first night, but now I've figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Cord!
customer_reviews.text: The cord doesn't work anymore. The face doesn't light up and the alarm and sunrise feature doesn't work unless I use a cord from another device (which I need for that device).
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worked just long enough to get past the return window. The light works great for waking me up however the clock is fast, and if you touch it wrong it resets itself. I cant reset it at all now. Spend the money to buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Unit never worked properly. Tried for a week and every day it would start at a ridiculous time. It served its purpose of waking me up...just not at the right time. Perhaps just my unit was defective, but I didn’t want to try again
customer_reviews.author: MrsDLA

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 9 year old granddaughter. She wanted an alarm clock that she could set the radio as the alarm. She told me she really likes it, and the gradual light helps wake her up without startling her.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Berger

customer_reviews.title: Okay clock
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy waking up to the light. It seems to make waking up less jarring but the sounds available on this clock are terrible and even on the quietest setting they’re pretty loud for a light sleeper like me. I wish I could just have no sound and the light kick on.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The light wakeup feature works as described, band the 'nature' sounds are a bit cheesy--not really natural at all, but they do the job. The FM radio reception is a disapointment--it's absolutely terrible, no station stays in tune for more than a few minutes unless I hold the antenna. Worthless as a radio.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating button response makes this alarm more trouble than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this clock. The "touch" buttons are very finicky, and often take several tries to do simple things like set the alarm time. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Vasconcelos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and it works like a champ! This wakes him up!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Doyne

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning alarm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept but unfortunately poor quality. The clock constantly resets itself so it has gone off in the middle of the night multiple times and also not gone off in the morning to wake me for work. I would suggest purchasing from a different brand that is more dependable and works properly. I like how the product uses light to wake me up but it worked properly for 2 uses and now only malfunctions. A total waste of money and has hindered my job.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great clock, cord port broke
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we wanted and had all the features we wanted. However about a month after receiving it, the power cord port broke and it can no longer be plugged in so it's constantly operating in battery mode and that defeats the purpose of all the cool features we ordered it for
customer_reviews.author: Genna Arnell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: But I lost the instructions lol. So resetting it is such a pain but I love waking up to the light and radio. The sound effects are sooooooo terrible but the radio option is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Makes getting up in the dark easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love this on those dark mornings. Makes a little easier to get up when you have the soft gradual glow. I haven’t used the sound feature so I cannot comment on that. Super easy to use. Great idea for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bjorkman

customer_reviews.title: Too loud, bright and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute but not sturdy. It feel one time and the cover came off. Now, the charging cable doesn’t stay on and falls off with the slightest motion of the night table.
customer_reviews.author: Lixie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little sunrise alarm
customer_reviews.text: Works well, can set the volume to 0 which is great if you just want to wake up with light and no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brad_VA

customer_reviews.title: Wakes great! Very bright.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I didn’t get the name brand. Great device at reasonable price. Bright! Full rainbow transition is nice. Audio choices a bit lacking. Also too loud. Even on lowest setting. I filled speaker vent with ivory bar soap. Can’t even tell. Took care of volume issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Brandao

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and looses time
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is fine other than the fact that it looses time. It is a bit difficult to use. I cannot adjust the volume and when it is dark, the buttons are hard to see to turn it on or adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: sbmorkiemum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sunrise clock! It makes getting up in the morning so much easier. I don't like the sounds but I just shut them off and the light wakes me up. It was not hard to figure out. I would recommend it to those who miss the sun coming up early.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I wake up at 2 am for work
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I wake up at 2 am for work, long drive and early shifts. It is ALWAYS rough walking up that early, no matter how much sleep I get, im always tired. this really helps me out in the morning. helps me wake up more naturally, to the timed light, much better then my load alarm clock shocking me awake
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J edwards

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this clock at first. The light was a great way to wake up, nice and gradual, felt much more natural than a blaring alarm. The sounds are poor quality and functionality is a little old, but the clock was cheap and I only really cared about the light. It was bigger than I expected. It worked great for about a month and a half, but now the light doesn't come on at all at the set alarm time. I logged on here to return it, but it looks like it's too late. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for very long.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this alarm clock...AT FIRST. It made waking up much smoother for me and greatly decreased the amount of anxiety I have in the mornings as soon as I wake up. Now it does not work anymore. First the snooze button stopped working and the alarm wouldn’t go off a second time. Then the alarm didn’t sound at all. Now the lights and the alarm sound do not work. I am VERY disappointed as I really liked this at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: stopped working properly after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock worked fine for approx. 2 weeks but then suddenly every time the sunrise light would turn on in the morning a very high pitched ringing noise would come from the alarm clock until the light was shut off. Tried changing the different sound options for the alarm and that didn't stop the ringing.
customer_reviews.author: PointAfter

customer_reviews.title: Mirco USB connector is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I would have given higher ratings if is continued to work well. First six months it worked great. Kids loved it and were able to use it daily. After that the micro USB connection to the unit became loose and no longer work properly. I think if they fix the micro USB connection to the actual unit it would perform better.
customer_reviews.author: Divyang Patel

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until one day it just stopped working. The touch part lasted six months. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for the low price. It wakes me up earlier especially in darker, colder seasons. Only cons are the antennae could be better for receiving radio stations and the alarm can't be set for certain days of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but my sister is just a sloth
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product just not for everyone. I got it for my sister cause she could literally sleep through an earthquake. Sometimes it helps but a lot of the time she just throws a blanket on it. It’ll work if you want it to but if you’re anything like my sister good luck
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: The snooze duration is set to 5 minutes and cannot be changed.
customer_reviews.text: Positives: The design is cool, and the light works very well. There are a variety of sounds to choose from, and the volume can get very loud. Negatives: The snooze duration is set to 5 minutes and cannot be changed. The instructions explicitly warn: "To avoid failure interval of every touch must be more than 1 second." Setting it up is a bit wonky, but once it's done it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Actual junk
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this purchase and would return if I could. Alarm sounds are annoying, making the buttons work is a chore, and it took me 10 minutes each night to set the alarm for the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and choices are awful. To turn off the light is odd - it turns green once before it actually turns off? The instructions have spelling errors which goes to show the level of quality this product is. Overall it is not a great way to wake up in the morning. After a month of dissatisfied use, I will be donating to GoodWill.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Madden

customer_reviews.title: Sunrise
customer_reviews.text: The radio cord is kind of annoying. Clock itself is not very heavy. Lights are plenty bright. Great deal for the price. Works well for a gradual wake up
customer_reviews.author: Maebee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed not what it says
customer_reviews.text: Can not play nature sounds to fall asleep. Cant see the time while using the radio. Also if you want to fall asleep to the radio dont count on the alarm to go off. Very disappointing. Likely sending back.
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I really like this alarm clock but would suggest spending more for better sound quality. Also, I wish the light came on at a low low dim and got brighter, it starts off to bright.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: It works. I guess.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this clock, I knew what I was getting. It is not a gradual wake up - I know instantly when the light comes on. And, after a month of use, its now randomly shutting the alarm feature off for some reason. It is a pain in the butt that anytime you unplug it, you have to reset everything - but - for 20 bucks, it's done what it said it was going to do.
customer_reviews.author: ESLoewe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cryptically difficult to program. I know the light turns on but failed to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ink Vine

customer_reviews.title: It’s unreliable and difficult.
customer_reviews.text: This clock is frustrating. The instructions are complicated and not intuitive. The nature sounds are low quality and annoying. The sunrise feature sometimes works and sometimes doesn’t. It’s unreliable for something that should be solid as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ingram

customer_reviews.title: I like this but it only seems to allow you to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it only seems to allow you to snooze 5 or 6 times - 5 minutes each also, no option to change it to 10. But overall it does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Haught

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend- doesn’t keep time we’ll.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use... the buttons don’t impress, so it is hard to register clicks. The light is very warm. Not intuitive! It doesn’t keep time we’ll either.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Love it (except when I have to turn it off)
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s great. I can see a difference in my sleep within a week. Only issue is to turn off the light after the alarm goes off is hard. The buttons are all white and in the center of the clock. So you’re staring into the light playing a guessing game on how to turn off the light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this clock! It has so many perfect features. The outlook is so elegant with beautiful warm light. I love the radio feature. I can wake up by the latest news. It can also wake you up with lights. I recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Richman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and highly functional!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and well crafted product. It makes my mornings so easy now. My son wakes up in a great mood and there is no fighting. This alarm brightens his room and allows his body to wake up in a more natural way.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Not extraordinary...
customer_reviews.text: It was ok at the beginning but it fell from a 20” night table and broke apart so not a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Joaquina

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this product but three days after i bought it the radio stopped working entirely. it refused to scan any channels or play at all. returned and will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: SM

product_meta.title: Sunrise Alarm Clock, Wake Up Light with 6 Nature Sounds, FM Radio, Color Light, Bedside Sunrise Simulator (White)
product_meta.description: Alarm Clock, Wake Up Light with 6 Nature Sounds, FM Radio, color Light, Bedside Sunrise Simulator (White)
feature_bullets: 【6 NATURE SOUNDS AND MULTI-COLOR】If you miss the birds singing in mountain you can set it as alarm clock.Fiery Youth wake up light have 6 sounds and FM radio (could search up to15 channels) meet up all your expectations; 7 fixable colors allow you express mood through lights.
【UNIVERSAL CHARGER USB & ADAPTER】This upgraded sunrise alarm clock can be charged by any universal Android USB port. An adapter is included in the package.You can take it every where you want to go.

【GENTAL SUNRISE】Wake up light have 10 levels brightness up to 102.34 Lumens.It starts shining 30 mins before your set time which gently brings you out of deep sleep to wide awake from dark yellow to shiny white.
【7 Colors Light & Mood Light Mode】 Choosing your favorite color light: warm white/green/red/blue/purple/orange/indigo. And 10 adjustable brightness settings as a bedside lamp to protect your eyes.
【You Will Get】 1* Wake Up Light, 1* USB Cable,1* 5V/1A Adapter & 1 Year Warranty.

specifications.Item model number: Alarm Clock, Wake Up Light with 6 Nature
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars314 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
